授業目的:
- Learn about the fundamentals of entrepreneurship
- Discuss case studies and apply critical thinking skills
- Create, name, and develop a new product or service
- Create a marketing survey, collect data, analyze, and present results
- Multimedia presentation(s) using business English
- Create a professional business (marketing) plan
- Create a professional, interesting video describing product or service benefits
- Produce a professional western style business resume
- Participate in a job interview and effectively answer and ask questions
到達目標:
- Remember and understand main ideas and details from readings and video content through summaries, discussions, and connections
- Synthesize information and concepts to create new ideas through charts, diagrams, videos, and inventions
- Analyze and evaluate information and data providing comparisons, explanations, inferences, critiques, and recommendations using discourse markers and business vocabulary
- Communicate through the understanding and use of gestures, eye contact and tone of voice while applying business concepts and vocabulary
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
